languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, меня же это не касается... хотя посмотреть, как этого бледнокожего ублюдка отделают, я не против!"
"Lord Captain, it's none of my business... but seeing that pasty scumbag get the crap beaten out of him is fine by me!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, меня же это не касается... хотя посмотреть, как этого бледнокожего ублюдка отделают, я не против!"

languages.text: “舰长大人，这可不关我的事……不过，我很乐意看到那个白花花的人渣被揍得屁滚尿流！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it's none of my business... but seeing that pasty scumbag get the crap beaten out of him is fine by me!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这可不关我的事……不过，我很乐意看到那个白花花的人渣被揍得屁滚尿流！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, no es de mi incumbencia... ¡pero no tengo ningún reparo en ver cómo zurran a ese paliducho!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it's none of my business... but seeing that pasty scumbag get the crap beaten out of him is fine by me!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, no es de mi incumbencia... ¡pero no tengo ningún reparo en ver cómo zurran a ese paliducho!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, tout ça, ce ne sont pas mes affaires... mais j'avoue que je suis pas contre l'idée de voir ce connard blafard se prendre une raclée ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it's none of my business... but seeing that pasty scumbag get the crap beaten out of him is fine by me!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, tout ça, ce ne sont pas mes affaires... mais j'avoue que je suis pas contre l'idée de voir ce connard blafard se prendre une raclée ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es geht mich ja nichts an ... aber ich kann damit leben, dass diesem käsigen Mistkerl die Seele aus dem Leib geprügelt wird!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it's none of my business... but seeing that pasty scumbag get the crap beaten out of him is fine by me!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, es geht mich ja nichts an ... aber ich kann damit leben, dass diesem käsigen Mistkerl die Seele aus dem Leib geprügelt wird!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、これは私には関係ないことだもの…でも、あのしまりのないクズがボコボコにされるのを眺めるのはスッキリするわね！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it's none of my business... but seeing that pasty scumbag get the crap beaten out of him is fine by me!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、これは私には関係ないことだもの…でも、あのしまりのないクズがボコボコにされるのを眺めるのはスッキリするわね！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, haddim değil ama... Şu solgun şerefsizin eşek sudan gelinceye kadar dövüldüğünü görmekle hiç sorunum yok!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it's none of my business... but seeing that pasty scumbag get the crap beaten out of him is fine by me!"
